sqlMap.statement:
SELECT IF.WMS_REC_ID ,WH.WH_CD ,IF.INTERFACE_ID INTFC_ID ,IF.EZINTIME INTFC_RCV_TS ,IF.TRANSACTION_ID INTFC_TRX_ID ,IF.UNIT_ID INTFC_TRX_SQ_NUM ,IF.WMS_MDSE_CD ,IF.WMS_PKG_CD ,IF.WMS_STK_STS_CD ,IF.WMS_PROC_QTY ,IF.WMS_UOM_CD USR_ID_03 ,IF.WMS_RCPT_DT_TM_TS ,IF.INBD_ORD_NUM ,IF.INBD_ORD_TP_CD ,TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(IF.WMS_REC_ID, -3)) INBD_ORD_LINE_NUM ,IF.SER_NUM ,IF.WMS_RCPT_ID ,WH.WMS_ORG_HOST_ID WMS_ORG_HOST_ID ,RW.INVTY_OWNR_CD FROM NLGI0200_01 IF ,WMS_WH WH ,RTL_WH RW WHERE IF.INTERFACE_ID = #interfaceId# AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.WH_CD = WH.WH_CD AND WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
#elem[]#
AND WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND WH.WH_CD = RW.WMS_WH_CD (+) AND IF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND WH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY IF.INTERFACE_ID ,IF.TRANSACTION_ID ,IF.SEGMENT_ID ,IF.UNIT_ID ,IF.SEQ_NUMBER

SELECT IF.WMS_REC_ID ,WH.WH_CD ,IF.INTERFACE_ID INTFC_ID ,IF.EZINTIME INTFC_RCV_TS ,IF.TRANSACTION_ID INTFC_TRX_ID ,IF.UNIT_ID INTFC_TRX_SQ_NUM ,IF.WMS_STS_CD ,IF.WMS_RSN_CD ,IF.WMS_MDSE_CD ,IF.WMS_FROM_PKG_CD ,IF.WMS_TO_PKG_CD ,IF.WMS_FROM_STK_STS_CD ,IF.WMS_TO_STK_STS_CD ,IF.WMS_PROC_QTY ,IF.WMS_ADJ_PCT USR_ID_02 ,IF.WMS_UOM_CD USR_ID_03 ,IF.WMS_TRX_DT_TM_TS ,IF.SER_NUM ,WH.WMS_ORG_HOST_ID WMS_ORG_HOST_ID ,RW.INVTY_OWNR_CD ,M.RCV_SER_TAKE_FLG FROM NLGI0200_02 IF ,WMS_WH WH ,RTL_WH RW ,MDSE M WHERE IF.INTERFACE_ID = #interfaceId# AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.WH_CD = WH.WH_CD AND WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
#elem[]#
AND WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND WH.WH_CD = RW.WMS_WH_CD (+) AND WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = M.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND IF.WMS_MDSE_CD = M.MDSE_CD(+) AND IF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND WH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND M.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' ORDER BY IF.INTERFACE_ID ,IF.TRANSACTION_ID ,IF.SEGMENT_ID ,IF.UNIT_ID ,IF.SEQ_NUMBER

SELECT IF.WMS_REC_ID ,WH.WH_CD ,IF.INTERFACE_ID INTFC_ID ,IF.EZINTIME INTFC_RCV_TS ,IF.TRANSACTION_ID INTFC_TRX_ID ,IF.UNIT_ID INTFC_TRX_SQ_NUM ,IF.WMS_MDSE_CD ,IF.WMS_PKG_CD ,IF.WMS_STK_STS_CD ,IF.WMS_PROC_QTY ,IF.OTBD_ORD_NUM ,TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(IF.WMS_REC_ID, -3)) OTBD_ORD_LINE_NUM ,IF.WMS_SHIP_DT_TM_TS ,IF.WMS_CARR_CD ,IF.BOL_NUM ,IF.WMS_FRT_CHRG_AMT ,IF.SER_NUM ,WH.WMS_ORG_HOST_ID WMS_ORG_HOST_ID ,RW.INVTY_OWNR_CD FROM NLGI0200_03 IF ,WMS_WH WH ,RTL_WH RW WHERE IF.INTERFACE_ID = #interfaceId# AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.WH_CD = WH.WH_CD AND WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
#elem[]#
AND WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND WH.WH_CD = RW.WMS_WH_CD (+) AND IF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND WH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY IF.INTERFACE_ID ,IF.TRANSACTION_ID ,IF.SEGMENT_ID ,IF.UNIT_ID ,IF.SEQ_NUMBER

SELECT IF.WMS_REC_ID ,WH.WH_CD ,IF.INTERFACE_ID INTFC_ID ,IF.EZINTIME INTFC_RCV_TS ,IF.TRANSACTION_ID INTFC_TRX_ID ,IF.UNIT_ID INTFC_TRX_SQ_NUM ,IF.WMS_MDSE_CD ,IF.WMS_PKG_CD ,IF.WMS_STK_STS_CD ,IF.WMS_PROC_QTY ,IF.OTBD_ORD_NUM ,TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(IF.WMS_REC_ID, -3)) OTBD_ORD_LINE_NUM ,IF.WMS_TRX_DT_TM_TS ,IF.WMS_CARR_CD ,IF.BOL_NUM ,IF.SER_NUM ,WH.WMS_ORG_HOST_ID WMS_ORG_HOST_ID ,RW.INVTY_OWNR_CD FROM NLBI0250_01 IF ,WMS_WH WH ,RTL_WH RW WHERE IF.INTERFACE_ID = #interfaceId# AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.WH_CD = WH.WH_CD AND WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
#elem[]#
AND WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND WH.WH_CD = RW.WMS_WH_CD (+) AND IF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND WH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY IF.INTERFACE_ID ,IF.TRANSACTION_ID ,IF.SEGMENT_ID ,IF.UNIT_ID ,IF.SEQ_NUMBER

SELECT WH.WH_CD ,IF.INTERFACE_ID INTFC_ID ,IF.EZINTIME INTFC_RCV_TS ,IF.TRANSACTION_ID INTFC_TRX_ID ,IF.UNIT_ID INTFC_TRX_SQ_NUM ,IF.WMS_MDSE_CD ,IF.WMS_PKG_CD AS WMS_PKG_CD ,IF.WMS_STK_STS_CD ,IF.WMS_PROC_QTY ,IF.WMS_UOM_CD USR_ID_03 ,IF.WMS_TRX_DT_TM_TS ,IF.SER_NUM ,WH.WMS_ORG_HOST_ID WMS_ORG_HOST_ID ,RW.INVTY_OWNR_CD FROM NLCI0250_01 IF ,WMS_WH WH ,RTL_WH RW WHERE IF.INTERFACE_ID = #interfaceId# AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.WH_CD = WH.WH_CD AND WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
#elem[]#
AND WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RW.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND WH.WH_CD = RW.WMS_WH_CD (+) AND IF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND WH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY IF.INTERFACE_ID ,IF.TRANSACTION_ID ,IF.SEGMENT_ID ,IF.UNIT_ID ,IF.SEQ_NUMBER
SELECT TASK.WMS_TASK_CD ,TASK.INTFC_TP_ID FROM WMS_TASK TASK WHERE TASK.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TASK.WMS_TASK_CD = #wmsTaskCd# AND TASK.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT IF.INTERFACE_ID INTFC_ID ,IF.EZINTIME INTFC_RCV_TS ,IF.TRANSACTION_ID INTFC_TRX_ID ,IF.UNIT_ID INTFC_TRX_SQ_NUM ,IF.WMS_REC_ID ,IF.WH_CD ,IF.WMS_TASK_CD ,IF.WMS_STS_CD ,IF.WMS_RSN_CD ,IF.WMS_MDSE_CD ,IF.WMS_PKG_CD ,IF.WMS_TAG_ID ,IF.WMS_LOT_NUM ,IF.WMS_LOC_ID ,IF.WMS_ORG_QTY ,IF.WMS_ORD_QTY ,IF.WMS_EXPD_QTY ,IF.RCV_TO_DATE_QTY ,IF.WMS_PROC_QTY ,IF.WMS_CNTNR_ID ,IF.WMS_OUT_CNTNR_NUM ,IF.SER_NUM ,IF.WMS_STK_STS_CD ,IF.WMS_DMG_FLG ,IF.WMS_OLD_STK_STS_CD ,IF.WMS_OLD_DMG_FLG ,IF.WMS_OP_ID ,IF.INBD_ORD_NUM ,IF.INBD_ORD_TP_CD ,IF.INBD_ORD_LINE_NUM ,IF.WMS_RCV_NUM ,IF.WMS_RCPT_ID ,IF.WMS_SPLY_NM ,IF.WMS_RCV_LOC_ID ,IF.OTBD_ORD_NUM ,IF.OTBD_ORD_TP_CD ,IF.OTBD_ORD_LINE_NUM ,IF.WMS_LINE_SQ_NUM ,IF.WMS_ORD_STS_CD ,IF.WMS_SHIP_ID ,IF.WMS_ASN_NUM ,IF.PACK_MARK_SEPT_FLG ,IF.WMS_WAVE_ID ,IF.WH_SRCH_ID ,IF.WMS_TOT_VOL ,IF.WMS_TOT_WT ,IF.WMS_TOT_PIECE_NUM ,IF.ORD_LINE_CPLT_FLG ,IF.SHIP_UNIT_WT ,IF.WMS_AWB_NUM ,IF.BOL_NUM ,IF.WMS_MNIF_NUM ,IF.PRO_NUM ,IF.WMS_INV_NUM ,IF.WMS_CARR_CD ,IF.WMS_TRAIL_ID ,IF.WMS_FRT_ID ,IF.WMS_FRT_CHRG_AMT ,IF.WMS_FRT_TERM_CD ,IF.SHIP_TO_LOC_NM ,IF.SHIP_TO_FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,IF.SHIP_TO_SCD_LINE_ADDR ,IF.SHIP_TO_CTY_ADDR ,IF.SHIP_TO_ST_NM ,IF.SHIP_TO_POST_CD ,IF.WMS_GRP_ID_01 ,IF.WMS_GRP_ID_02 ,IF.WMS_GRP_ID_03 ,IF.USR_ID_01 ,IF.USR_ID_02 ,IF.USR_ID_03 ,IF.WMS_TRX_DT_TM_TS ,IF.WMS_RCPT_DT_TM_TS ,IF.WMS_RTN_DT_TM_TS ,IF.WMS_SHIP_DT_TM_TS ,IF.WMS_DATA_CRAT_DT_TM_TS ,IF.WMS_DATA_MOD_DT_TM_TS ,IF.MOD_BY_TXT ,IF.MOD_BY_RESRC_TXT ,IF.WMS_MOD_CNT ,IF.WMS_CNTNR_NUM ,IF.EST_DOCK_DT_TM_TS ,IF.TMS_FRT_CHRG_AMT ,IF.TMS_FRT_CHRG_COST_AMT ,WH.WMS_ORG_HOST_ID WMS_ORG_HOST_ID ,TASK.INTFC_TP_ID INTFC_TP_ID FROM NLGI0200_01 IF ,WMS_WH WH ,WMS_TASK TASK WHERE IF.WH_CD = WH.WH_CD AND WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND WH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TASK.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND IF.WMS_TASK_CD = TASK.WMS_TASK_CD AND TASK.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND IF.INTERFACE_ID = #interfaceId# AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId#
#elem[]#
AND IF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY IF.INTERFACE_ID ,IF.TRANSACTION_ID ,IF.SEGMENT_ID ,IF.UNIT_ID ,IF.SEQ_NUMBER

SELECT RSLT.WMS_ORD_TP_CD FROM ( SELECT WMS_ORD_TP_CD FROM WMS_INBD_SO_HDR WMS WHERE WMS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND WMS.WMS_SO_ID = #otbdOrdNum# AND WMS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY WMS.WMS_SQ_NUM DESC ) RSLT WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT RSLT.WMS_PRCH_TP_CD FROM ( SELECT WIPH.WMS_PRCH_TP_CD FROM WMS_INBD_PO_HDR WIPH WHERE WIPH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND WIPH.WMS_PO_ID = #inbdOrdNum# AND WIPH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY WMS_SQ_NUM DESC ) RSLT WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT RWS.SCE_ORD_TP_CD ,RWS.RWS_REF_NUM ,RWS.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM ,RWS.RWS_QTY ,MW.INBD_ORD_NUM ,MW.INBD_ORD_LINE_NUM ,MW.WMS_QTY FROM ( SELECT RH.SCE_ORD_TP_CD ,RH.RWS_REF_NUM ,TO_NUMBER(RD.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM) AS RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM ,SUM(RD.RWS_QTY) AS RWS_QTY FROM RWS_HDR RH ,RWS_DTL RD WHERE RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RH.RWS_REF_NUM = #inbdOrdNum# AND RH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RH.RWS_NUM = RD.RWS_NUM AND RH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' GROUP BY RH.SCE_ORD_TP_CD ,RH.RWS_REF_NUM ,RD.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM ) RWS , ( SELECT INBD_ORD_NUM ,INBD_ORD_LINE_NUM ,SUM(WMS_ORD_QTY) AS WMS_QTY FROM WMS_INBD_TRX WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND INBD_ORD_NUM = #inbdOrdNum# AND WMS_TASK_CD = #wmsTaskCd# AND PROC_STS_CD in (#procInComp#, #procComp#) AND EZCANCELFLAG ='0' GROUP BY INBD_ORD_NUM ,INBD_ORD_LINE_NUM ,WMS_TASK_CD ) MW WHERE RWS.RWS_REF_NUM = MW.INBD_ORD_NUM(+) AND RWS.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM = MW.INBD_ORD_LINE_NUM(+) ORDER BY RWS.RWS_REF_NUM ,RWS.RWS_DTL_LINE_NUM ,MW.INBD_ORD_NUM ,MW.INBD_ORD_LINE_NUM
SELECT TP.SCE_ORD_TP_CD FROM SCE_ORD_TP TP WHERE TP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TP.S80_ORD_TP_CD = #s80OrdTpCd# AND TP.INBD_OTBD_CD = #inbdOtbdCd# AND TP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT DISTINCT RS.RTL_SWH_CD FROM RTL_SWH RS WHERE RS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RS.RTL_WH_CD LIKE #rtlWhCd# AND RS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
